title: GetRootIndexFilename Extension Update - COMPLETED
details:
TASK: Update GetRootIndexFilename to return relative path with .md extension - COMPLETED

CHANGES MADE:

1. ✅ Updated GetRootIndexFilename method:
   - Now passes full filename (with .md extension) to CalculateRelativePath
   - Removed Path.GetFileNameWithoutExtension() calls
   - Used Path.GetFileName() for template-type: main fallback
   - Changed final fallback from "index" to "index.md"

2. ✅ Updated CalculateRelativePath method:
   - Changed parameter name from indexFileName to indexFilename for clarity
   - Updated documentation to reflect it now takes filename with extension
   - Updated documentation description from "Obsidian wikilink" to "markdown link"

3. ✅ Updated XML documentation examples:
   - Changed example returns from "../../../MBA" to "../../../MBA.md"
   - Changed example returns from "../index" to "../index.md"

RESULT:
The method now returns the complete relative path with the .md extension, suitable for markdown links:
- From nested folder: "../../../MBA.md"
- From program level: "../index.md"
- Same folder: "MBA.md" or "index.md"

This provides the complete path needed for markdown link syntax: [Home](../../MBA.md)

All tests pass and solution builds successfully.
